_xResult.title: Dotty for Sun Fun
_xResult.longdesc:
Why would you want a maxi that's made to measure? The bigger question is, why WOULDN'T you? Even flowy items look better and feel better when they're custom cut for length, bust, shoulders, etc. 

 

Case in point, this summer favorite custom made sundress from Teyxo of Romania. There are two pieces here, an underneath strapless stretch-viscose dress and then the chiffon over-layer. Instead of being a shapeless tube, the under layer dress is cut to your bust, waist and hip measurements so it's more comfortable and stays in place. The viscose fabric feels like a light summer T-shirt, so you stay cool in the hottest heat. An asymmetrical topper has adjustable string ties at each shoulder, and is just a bit sheer so you are sexy and covered at the same time!

 

Packs perfectly for a summer vacation, doesn't wrinkle, and goes easily from brunch to beach. 

 

Customizations: make sure you give your height and preferred length for both the inner and outer layer. You can do a sexy mini underneath or request to be longer (measure from top of bust to desired length on inner, and from shoulder to desired length for outer).

 

Use the box below to add the customizations request, in addition to your standard Balodana body measurement profile.
